author: Paul Steinhauser
title: Georgia GOP gubernatorial clash: Kemp charges 'Perdue got rich sending jobs to China'

author: Paul Steinhauser
title: Georgia GOP gubernatorial clash: Kemp charges 'Perdue got rich sending jobs to China'

sentence: Governors ? GA-Gov: Polling on behalf of local CBS affiliate WGCL, Landmark Communications surveyed the May 24 Republican primary for governor and finds incumbent Brian Kemp holding a dominant 52-28 lead over former Sen. David Perdue, with 10% going to educator Kandiss Taylor.
title: rhetoric despite pleas from Asian Americans
